channel.title: [C4D] Cigarettes
channel.description:
Woo! Back! I guess for now. I've been browsing around a bit and have noticed people [i]remember[/i] me :eek:
A few were like STH is no longer here and stuff. But alas! I am!
I just haven't posted much.
So I figured I'd post a newer work of mine. It's a sig I made for my clan on CS:S. [img]http://somethingtohide.heliohost.org/images/fast.png[/img]
Nothing special. But I loveeee the art of simplicity. You can even tell that in my photography. Lots of that cliche macro photography.
Anyways. Since a few of you regard me as good at C4D. I'm here for your help!
Anything you need, tips or how-to-do's, I'll help you.
I don't know if we can do it in this forum, cause it's for posting works. If not, I'll have another one online soon, or you can reach me on AIM.
EDIT: aha, noticed there's a help section ;)

item.title: [C4D] Cigarettes
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:9, topic:130814”]Ohh do you mean the sparker cylinder thingy?
I see what you mean now.

It doesn’t look that low the way I modeled it, maybe the shadows and angle is playing a part in that.
Weird.[/quote]
Glad you see what I mean, I thought I was losin it

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Cigarettes
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Ohh do you mean the sparker cylinder thingy?
I see what you mean now.

It doesn’t look that low the way I modeled it, maybe the shadows and angle is playing a part in that.
Weird.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Cigarettes
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:7, topic:130814”]Haha are you sure?

Cause I modeled it using references I took of my own lighter on my desk.
It lights just fine :D[/quote]
Yeah lol, either that or it’s just a weird angle.

compared to

item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Haha are you sure?

Cause I modeled it using references I took of my own lighter on my desk.

item.title: [C4D] Cigarettes
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

I just noticed one more thing, there’s no way someone could light that lighter, the metal “sheath” around where the flame comes out is too long preventing someone from using it.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Cigarettes
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

The cigarette box texture was actually a very old texture I had on here for another project like this once. I just heavily modified it.

Everything else I make myself.

Although we might be using “make” in a different term.

Most of the time I make the completely out of shaders. No pictures or anything.

But sometimes like in this case, I find a picture of whatever I’m making, and take bits and peices to build a texture that would work.

And then I kinda, start over. Like make a texture based on that texture.

Read full topic
